must_attend.event_name: Forty-Second International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML 2025)
must_attend.tagline: Premier global event for machine learning research and industry innovation
must_attend.why_relevant: Top AI & ML conference with extensive academic and industry presences; ideal for networking with investors and tech leaders
must_attend.expected_attendees: Several thousand researchers, practitioners, and industry leaders
must_attend.expected_speakers: Leading AI/ML researchers and industry experts
must_attend.estimated_cost: Varies; early bird and student rates available, mid-tier for professionals

must_attend.tagline: Major marketing and sales conference blending business growth strategies
must_attend.why_relevant: Large-scale marketing event covering sales and growth strategies with substantial investor-oriented networking opportunities
must_attend.expected_attendees: Tens of thousands of marketing and sales professionals, executives
must_attend.expected_speakers: Top marketing leaders and business growth experts
must_attend.estimated_cost: Mid-tier ticket options with early bird pricing

must_attend.event_name: Third International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (AIM-2026)
must_attend.tagline: International gathering focused on AI & ML developments and business networking
must_attend.why_relevant: Focus on AI/ML advances with strong business and investor networking potential; aligns with mid-tier budget
must_attend.expected_attendees: Hundreds to low thousands of AI/ML professionals and investors
must_attend.expected_speakers: Industry experts and academic leaders in AI/ML

must_attend.event_name: Machine Learning Conference Munich Edition (MLcon Munich 2026)
must_attend.tagline: Discussing advancements in ML with networking focused on investment opportunities
must_attend.why_relevant: Strong ML focus with networking sessions designed to attract investors and industry professionals

should_attend.tagline: Top marketing minds exploring brand growth and success
should_attend.why_relevant: Strong marketing focus with moderator-size audience and professional mid-tier pricing

should_attend.tagline: Focus on social marketing and behavior change strategies
should_attend.why_relevant: Niche focus on social marketing, relevant to marketing interests with medium networking potential

nice_to_attend.event_name: The Caltech and University of Chicago Conference on AI+Science 2025
nice_to_attend.tagline: Exploring AI applications in scientific research
nice_to_attend.why_relevant: Specialized AI in science focus, smaller audience; good for niche academic interest
nice_to_attend.expected_attendees: A few hundred scientists and AI researchers
